comment._content: I started an entry for him in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frederick_Wallingford_Whitridge

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of June 6, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E07E1D61730E733A... indicates that Whitridge returned from Europe on the maiden voyage of the Aquitania, arriving at New York the day before.
